name: Trash Man - Protect the planet!
description: In this little top down game your goal is to make the world as clean as possible! Bad people always throw their garbage in the beautiful nature. Luckly you get points by picking it up. So go out there and collect as much trash as possible in a small time period! You can also buy upgrades to be even more efficent. And the BEST part?? You can buy yourself cute little HELPERS!!!
